location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to Captain W J Hamilton, Commander of the HCC Nautilus

physicalDescription.extent: Pest damage to the signature of the letter.

mods.abstract: The letter contains orders concerning a packet that is to be delivered to Neil Benjamin Edmonstone at Fort William, Calcutta along with three smaller packets bound for each of the Presidencies.
